actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to allow fire departments to transmit nonemergency communications relating to official fire department business over fire department radio frequencies.

summary.text: Directs the Federal Communications Commission to amend its rules and regulations with respect to the Fire Radio Service to permit the transmission of communications of a nonemergency nature relating to official fire department business over frequencies available to the Fire Radio Service.

titles.title: A bill to allow fire departments to transmit nonemergency communications relating to official fire department business over fire department radio frequencies.
